attributes.action: remove VAT costs from femine sanitary protection
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is felt this is a unfair tax as it not something a woman has any choice about. The female body menstruates with or without permission and therefore all woman have to buy sanitary protection.  This is a tax on being female.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
